descriptionHtml:
I simply love the ADEC body but was bummed that there weren\'t any tattoo textures for it, so using CandymanXXL\'s PSDs he released on nexus for free use, I decided to whip something up.

It\'s my 1st work so it\'s probably not up on par with ADEC\'s fantastic work.

Installation is easy just copy femalebody_1.dds to \\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female

Credits go to Acdale for making such an amazing body mod. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390)
Credits go to CandymanXXL for creating the tattoos and releasing them as a PSD. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7052)
author: Danteh
